title: Sugarlump and the Unicorn
description: The unicorn has a silver horn,Her eyes are bright and blue,And when she hears a horse's wishShe can make that wish come true.Sugarlump the rocking horse longs for adventure. But when a magical unicorn grants his wish, he soon discovers there's no match for the fun of playing with playing with children. Is it too late to change his mind?'an absolute delight to read aloud' - Daily Mail
author: Julia Donaldson
